content.thinking: I need to extract information from the provided Colombian ID document (Cédula de Ciudadanía) following the specified schema and extraction methodology. Let me analyze the document carefully: ### Document Analysis - This is clearly a Colombian national ID card ("Cédula de Ciudadanía") - The document has text in Spanish - It appears to be an official government-issued document with proper headers and formatting ### Information Extraction from the Document First side of the ID card: - Header: "REPUBLICA DE COLOMBIA" - Document type: "IDENTIFICACION PERSONAL" / "CEDULA DE CIUDADANIA" - Number: "72.252.799" - Surnames (APELLIDOS): "QUIÑONES MORALES" - Names (NOMBRES): "ALFONSO ANGEL" - There's a signature and photo Second side of the ID card: - Birth date (FECHA DE NACIMIENTO): "16-JUN-1979" - Birth place (LUGAR DE NACIMIENTO): "SANTO TOMAS (ATLANTICO)" - Height (ESTATURA): "1.83" - Blood type (G.S. RH): "A+" - Sex (SEXO): "M" (Male) - Issue date and place (FECHA Y LUGAR DE EXPEDICION): "23-NOV-1998 BARRANQUILLA" - Fingerprint and barcode information ### Mapping to Required Schema 1. firstName: "ALFONSO ANGEL" - Extracted from "NOMBRES" field 2. lastName: "QUIÑONES MORALES" - Extracted from "APELLIDOS" field 3. country_issuer: "Colombia" - The document header clearly states "REPUBLICA DE COLOMBIA" 4. nationality: "Colombia" - Colombian national ID implies Colombian nationality - Birth place is in Colombia (Santo Tomas, Atlántico) 5. identificationType: "Cédula de Ciudadanía" - Document explicitly states "CEDULA DE CIUDADANIA" 6. identificationNumber: "72.252.799" - Clearly labeled as "NUMERO" on the document 7. message: "" - No issues with extraction, document is clearly a valid official ID Now let me prepare the JSON response following the required schema:
